sense.name: a simplistic, formulaic conception of something
sense.commentary: STEREOTYPE[+form][+model][+formulaic][+simplified] Note: often has a pejorative implication
sense.examples: People in each region of the country have their own stereotypes of people from other regions. John's stereotype of a devil is a red figure with a pitchfork and horns. He struggled against the stereotype of a disabled person in the workplace.

sense.name: a cast metal printing plate
sense.examples: The printer showed us several 19th-century stereotypes. This stereotype was used to make prints from a wood engraving.
